Better Queue - Memory Store

The fastest, most performant, ephemeral store for better-queue.

Getting started

There’s nothing to do! It’s included with better-queue and used by default.

Examples

Please have a look at the better-queue documentation on how to use this store.

Contributions

Are welcome!

This library was initially made by the awesome team of engineers at Diamond.

If you haven’t already, make sure you install Diamond!
